shortDescription:
Commander, we need you in the {TGT_SYSTEM.name} system immediately. We lost contact with one of the minor royals of the region - Henriette Bosh. They frequently bombard us with a constant stream of requests yet, since some time, we haven't heard from them.

Please check on them and report back to us.
longDescription: Typical hire-a-merc baby sitting job. A royal going silent is unusual though. Usually we'd hope for them to shut up. Let's hope it's just some faulty communications but expect trouble.

objectiveList.title: Survive the trap
objectiveList.description: Survive the turret trap in alpha base

objectiveList.title: Destroy invading lance
objectiveList.description: Destroy the lance that is invading

objectiveList.title: Destroy occupying lance
objectiveList.description: Destroy the lance that is occupying the base

objectiveList.title: Destroy the occupied base turrets
objectiveList.description: Survive the occupied base turrets in bravo base

dialogueContent.words: We've been provided a possible location the Royal is staying at. We've had no replies on our attempted comms though, which is unusual to say the least. Let's head to the nearest location and move on from there, Team.
We've got our sensors on the team's location, Commander. We'll let you know the moment we see trouble.
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.mc_solved_crime}Darius, inform {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} that we're bringing Henriette in on charges of murder and other illegal activities.
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.mc_solved_crime}...WHAT?! Now listen here! I won't...
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.mc_solved_crime}Just silenced her comms... and understood. We'll let {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} handle her from here. Good work out there, Commander.
{MC.If.Encounter.HasNoTag.mc_solved_crime}Good work, Commander. Let's wrap this up and let Ms. Bosh get back to her life. We'll grab our pay and go.
This isn't worth the pay. We're getting you guys out. Hold tight.

Halton town - Commander {MC.PlayerLances.Commander.DisplayName} of {COMPANY.CompanyName} merc company on assignment for {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name}. We've been asked to contact Henriette Bosh. Do you know her whereabouts?
Commander, Halton here. Confirming credentials...
...Confirmed. Ms. Bosh is visiting her friend up in the next town. I'm forwarding the coordinates to you now.
Well... we can't baby sit when the baby isn't here. No baby, sitting no money.
Exactly, let's move on.

Halton town - Commander {MC.PlayerLances.Commander.DisplayName} of {COMPANY.CompanyName} merc company on assignment for {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name}. We've been asked to contact Henriette Bosh. Do you know her whereabouts?
Shit. Turrets spinning up, Commander.
Time for a fight. Light them up, pilots.

Halton town - Commander {MC.PlayerLances.Commander.DisplayName} of {COMPANY.CompanyName} merc company on assignment for {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name}. We've been asked to contact Henriette Bosh. Do you know her whereabouts?
Commander, Halton here. Ms. Bosh is here but...
Drop pods incoming, Commander!
Weapons free, pilots! Let's take them down fast.
What's going on, Commander?! Why would they be firing at us?

{MC.If.Commander.HasTag.commander_career_gladiator}{MC.Modification.AddTo.EncounterTags.mc_recognised_strange_turrets}<color=#85DBF6FF>[Gladiator Career]</color> ...the way those turrets came online. It reminds me of something I once saw in the arena. I'm not sure though. Let's check the next settlement.

{MC.If.Commander.HasTag.commander_career_merchantGuard}{MC.Modification.AddTo.EncounterTags.mc_recognised_strange_turrets}<color=#85DBF6FF>[Merchant Guard Career]</color> ...the way those turrets came online. It reminds me of a non-standard turret attack program I saw a merchant try and sell. No idea why that would be running here. Let's check the next settlement.
{MC.If.Commander.HasNoTags.commander_career_gladiator,commander_career_merchantGuard}I've no clue but I'm sure we'll find out at that other settlement nearby. Let's head out.
Thanks Commander. Ms. Bosh is here and...
{MC.Modification.AddTo.EncounterTags.mc_met_bosh_in_phase1}WHY I NEVER! My Deusenberg hovercar! It's ruined! You must learn to be a better pilot, Sir.
{MC.If.Commander.HasTag.commander_youth_bankrupt}<color=#85DBF6FF>[Bankrupt Youth]</color> That Deusenberg... that's a costly loss. I wouldn't worry though - insurance will pay well I'm sure.
{MC.If.Commander.HasTag.commander_youth_bankrupt}Yes... well... at least you know worth when you see it, Commander.
{MC.If.Commander.HasTag.commander_youth_loner}<color=#85DBF6FF>[Loner Youth]</color> You 'royals' are all the same. Only caring about the expensive things you can buy.
{MC.If.Commander.HasTag.commander_youth_loner}How covetous of you, Commander. Those like you care not for things they cannot afford.
[MC.Format.ToUpperFirst.{TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name}] wish you safe, Ms. Bosh. We'll have you out of here momentaily.
No you will not, Sir. We must pick up my dog at Henry's just across from us. I absolutely will not go with you unless little poo-poo comes too.
{MC.If.Commander.HasTag.commander_youth_loner}<color=#85DBF6FF>[Loner Youth]</color> Pilots, you heard our esteemed cargo. Time to get her 'shit'.
{MC.If.Commander.HasTag.background_career_pirate}<color=#85DBF6FF>[Pirate Youth]</color> Pilots, you heard our esteemed cargo. Time to get her 'shit'.
{MC.If.Commander.HasAnyTag.commander_youth_loner,background_career_pirate}Really, Commander. Must you be so crass?
{MC.If.Commander.HasNoTags.commander_youth_loner,background_career_pirate}Pilots, you heard Ms. Bosh. Our job's not over yet. Let's recover and extract that dog.

{MC.If.Encounter.HasNoTag.mc_met_bosh_in_phase1}[MC.Format.ToUpperFirst.{TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym}] settlement, Commander {MC.Commander.DisplayName} here. We've been sent to check-in on Henriette Bosh.
{MC.If.Encounter.HasNoTag.mc_met_bosh_in_phase1}She's unavailable. Go away.
{MC.If.Encounter.HasNoTag.mc_met_bosh_in_phase1}...and you will get nothing unless you do what I told you!
{MC.If.Encounter.HasNoTag.mc_met_bosh_in_phase1}This is useless. Fine... we'll take what we want from here instead then. Boys, raise hell!
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.mc_met_bosh_in_phase1}{TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} settlement, we're here to pick up Henriette Bosh's dog.
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.mc_met_bosh_in_phase1}Ahem. Ms Bosh, if you may.

{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.mc_met_bosh_in_phase1}About time you showed up. We couldn't find that damn dog anyway. This is getting too troublesome so pay us our dues and we're gone. At least we took out your car.
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.mc_recognised_strange_turrets}{MC.Modification.AddTo.EncounterTags.mc_solved_crime}|SKIPDIALOGUE|
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.mc_met_bosh_in_phase1}{MC.Modification.AddTo.EncounterTags.mc_solved_crime}|SKIPDIALOGUE|
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.mc_recognised_strange_turrets}Of course! That turret behaviour. This is a setup! Henriette must have hired these guys.
{{MC.If.Encounter.HasNoTag.mc_recognised_strange_turrets} AND {MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.mc_solved_crime}}This is a setup! Henriette must have hired these guys.
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.mc_solved_crime}An insurance scam... really?!
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.mc_solved_crime}No wonder she went quiet. She didn't want to be disturbed.
{MC.If.Encounter.HasNoTag.mc_solved_crime}Sounds like there's more going on here than we expected, Commander. No time to figure it out right now though.
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.mc_met_bosh_in_phase1}Commander! Take these ruffians out this instant!
Turrets coming online and they're turning to face you. Careful, Commander.
Turrets coming online. They're friendly!
Finally, a lucky break.
{MC.If.Encounter.HasNoTag.mc_met_bosh_in_phase1}Commander! Halton radioed to let me know you were coming. I am completely fine. You may now leave.
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.mc_met_bosh_in_phase1}Commander! Little poo-poo must be around here somewhere.
Incoming Leopard and it's coming in hot.
{MC.If.Encounter.HasNoTag.mc_met_bosh_in_phase1}Oh... no! Save me... and my dog, Commander!
{MC.If.Encounter.HasNoTag.mc_met_bosh_in_phase1}Ms Bosh, we're here for your dog as per your reque...
{MC.If.Encounter.HasNoTag.mc_met_bosh_in_phase1}Commander! Take these ruffians out this instant!
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.mc_met_bosh_in_phase1}Ready up, Mechwarriors. Time for a fight.
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.mc_recognised_strange_turrets}{MC.Modification.AddTo.EncounterTags.mc_solved_crime}|SKIPDIALOGUE|
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.mc_met_bosh_in_phase1}{MC.Modification.AddTo.EncounterTags.mc_solved_crime}|SKIPDIALOGUE|
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.mc_recognised_strange_turrets}Of course! That turret behaviour. This is a setup! Henriette must have hired these guys.
{{MC.If.Encounter.HasNoTag.mc_recognised_strange_turrets} AND {MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.mc_solved_crime}}This is a setup! Henriette must have hired these guys.
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.mc_solved_crime}An insurance scam... really?!
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.mc_solved_crime}No wonder she went quiet. She didn't want to be disturbed.
{MC.If.Encounter.HasNoTag.mc_solved_crime}Sounds like there's more going on here than we expected, Commander. No time to figure it out right now though.
